body: Python African Tour is in Ghana: "Python African Tour (PAT) is an exciting African open source technology initiative aimed at promoting agile programming languages, mainly Python, among Africa's tech communities."
original_body: Python African Tour is in Ghana: "Python African Tour (PAT) is an exciting African open source technology initiative aimed at promoting agile programming languages, mainly Python, among Africa's tech communities."
title: Ghana: Python African Tour comes to Ghana
